channel.title: Out of memory error on my server: can anyone help me?
channel.description:
i keep getting this error:
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutofMemoryError: java heap space
it happens like 5 minutes after i start my server every time, and after that no one can log in. its really starting to piss me off, im sure someone knows how to fix it, so help would be much appriciated. i hope someone can help me.
thanks in advance
ipk[br][size=1]Posted at: August 18, 2006, 07:42:14 PM[/size][hr]can anyone help me?![br][size=1]Posted at: August 20, 2006, 12:57:23 AM[/size][hr]comon, someone must be able to help me![br][size=1]Posted at: August 20, 2006, 11:38:48 PM[/size][hr]doesnt anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Out of memory error on my server: can anyone help me?
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

actually

@echo off
color 0a
title Server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

item.source: Out of memory error on my server: can anyone help me?

item.title: Out of memory error on my server: can anyone help me?
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

dude its not an error seeing as i fixed it lol all you have to do is change something in runserver(this is what mine looks like and it now works):

@echo off
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar server

remove everything in your runserver.bat and put this there. It should now work fine and i testsed it seeing as i had the same problem

Read full topic
item.source: Out of memory error on my server: can anyone help me?

item.title: Out of memory error on my server: can anyone help me?
item.dc:creator: @defyboy defyboy
item.description:
@defyboy wrote:

This is because of poor coding, Something is leaking memory.

Increasing the memory size will only prolong the error. You should look and find the source of the problem and eradicate it.

512mb memory should be much more than enough. With 2000 players thats 260kb memory for each player.

“640kb should be enough for anyone” - Bill Gates

Read full topic

In your .bat do this:

java -Xmx500m client
